paper_abstract: This paper considers the l(1)-Compressive Sensing problem and presents an efficient algorithm that computes an exact solution. The idea consists in reformulating the problem such that it yields a modified Dantzig-Wolfe decomposition that allows to efficiently apply all standard simplex pivoting rules. Experimental results show the superiority of our approach compared to standard linear programming methods. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exact optimization for the l(1)-Compressive Sensing problem using a modified Dantzig-Wolfe method
